bibl.title: Arae. The Curse Poetry of Antiquity. (ARCA. Classical and Medieval Texts, Papers and Monographs. 26.)
bibl.note: Refers to P.G.M. - See in part. pp. 56-62: The Strasbourg Epode [P. Stras. Inv. 3 (= Pack2 1895)] and its Authorship [in favour of Hipponax]; - 63-66: Alcaeus fr. 129 L.-P. - Pp. 223-229: Appendix 3. Hellenistic Curse Poetry: The Texts [including Euphorion, ÉAra€ and Yròj]. - Pp. 260-263: Addendum [brief discussion of P. Brux. II, 22]. <Arai, Thraix>
